title: Labour MP tells GB News Keir Starmer is 'finished' as pressure mounts on PM over Lord Mandelson scandal
tags: Labour MPs say Keir Starmer's days are numbered and demand PM resigns over Mandelson scandal;Donald Trump set to APPROVE Labour's Chagos surrender after latest U-turn;Lord Mandelson ruled by 'bullying ethos' with history of media manipulation, veteran journalist says;The GB News Editorial Charter
